name: Hell Dodge
description:
Welcome to Hell Dodge!

Hell Dodge is an event organized by Satan and sponsored by God Himself! Participants will need to endure the rains of arrows and cannonballs for as long as they can. Whoever last the longest would win and be bestowed upon a reward that their heart desires. 

Choose your Characters!

Pick your favorite from 4 choices! Each character provides unique gameplay mechanics to spice up the gameplay and help (as well as hinder) you from achieving the highest score possible!

Controls

A = Move left
D = Move right
Space = Jump
Shift = Dash

Perks

 Invincibility = Allows you to ignore cannonballs and arrows for a short period of time

 Speed Boost= Temporarily increases your speed

 Wipeout= Removes all cannonballs and arrows on your screen

 Timeslow= Temporarily slows down time

 Extra Life = Adds an extra life (Excluding Succubus)

Battery Pack= Increases your battery meter (Robot only)

Soul Fragment = Gather 4 of them to get an extra life (Demon only)

💗 Lustful Desire= Increases your lust meter (Succubus only)

GameDev's Note:

This is our first game! please enjoy our game. We are still working in this game with more mechanics and system to implement, and we would like your opinion for this game! Thanks!
